collection:
Introduction  
This Privacy Policy outlines how ManySignals OÜ ("ManySignals", "we", "us", or
"our") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use AirTrack
GPT.

Information Collection  
Personal Data: This includes information such as your name, email address, and
any other data you provide while using AirTrack GPT.
Usage Data: We collect information on how the service is accessed and used.

This may include details like your computer's Internet Protocol address (IP
address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our service that you
visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, and
other diagnostic data.

Tracking & Cookies Data: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to
track activity on our service and hold certain information.

\- To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our
service.
sharing:
Transfer of Data  
Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to — and
maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country, or
other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from
those of your jurisdiction.

Disclosure of Data  
Legal Requirements: ManySignals OÜ may disclose your Personal Data in the good
faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with a legal obligation,
protect and defend the rights or property of ManySignals OÜ, prevent or
investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the service, protect the
personal safety of users of the service or the public, and protect against
legal liability.

Service Providers: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to
facilitate our service, provide the service on our behalf, perform service-
related services, or assist us in analyzing how our service is used.

Service Providers  
We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our service
("Service Providers"), provide the service on our behalf, perform service-
related services, or assist us in analyzing how our service is used.
